#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    int *p;  ;
    int n,i,j,temp,m,x;
   p=(int*)malloc(200*sizeof(int));
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
       scanf("%d",&n);
       *p=1; 
       m=1;   
       temp = 0; 
       for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
       {
            for(j=0;j<m;j++)
            {
               x = (*(p+j))*i+temp; 
               (*(p+j))=x%10; 
               temp = x/10;
            }
             while(temp>0)  
             { 
               (*(p+m))=temp%10;
               temp = temp/10;
               m++; 
             }
      }
              for(i=m-1;i>=0;i--)
              printf("%d",*(p+i));
              printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
